title: hTMLCodeFormat
name: hTMLCodeFormat
description:
Replaces special characters in a string with their HTML-escaped equivalents and inserts 
 and
tags at the beginning and end of the string. [version] HTML version to use. currently ignored. -1: The latest implementation of HTML 2.0: HTML 2.0 (Default) 3.2: HTML 3.2

arguments.name: string
arguments.description: A string or a variable that contains one.

arguments.name: version
arguments.description:
HTML version to use:
-1: The latest implementation of HTML
2.0: HTML 2.0 (default)
3.2: HTML 3.2
